casebody.data:
In the Matter of Frank A. BUCCI, Bankrupt. New York Credit Men’s Association, Appellant. No. 146. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 4, 1934. Francis E. Eivers, of New York City (Henry Welling, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Ealph E. Becker, of Port Chester, N. Y., for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
